name: Void
headline: The open source Cursor alternative
description: Void is an open source code editor with AI features similar to Cursor and GitHub Copilot. Unlike other tools, Void lets developers connect directly to open source LLM models without sending their private data through an external backend.

founders.name: Andrew Pareles, Founder
founders.description: Andrew is the CEO of Void. Before starting Void, he bootstrapped an edtech company, did quantum computing research @ Johns Hopkins APL, and studied computer science @ Cornell.

founders.name: Mathew Pareles, Founder
founders.description: Mathew is the CTO of Void, the open-source AI code editor. Mathew studied physics and computer science @ Cornell, and has previously conducted machine learning and materials science research.

raw_markdown="## [![Void Logo](https://voideditor.com/void/logo_cube_noshadow.png)Void](https://voideditor.com/</>)[Waitlist](https://voideditor.com/</email>)[Contribute](https://voideditor.com/<https:/github.com/voideditor/void#readme>)[Discord](https://voideditor.com/<https:/discord.gg/RSNjgaugJs>)[GitHub](https://voideditor.com/<https:/github.com/voideditor/void#readme>)
# ![A slice of the void](https://voideditor.com/void/slice_of_void.png)The open sourceAI code editor.
Void is an open source Cursor alternative. Write code with the best AI tools, use any model, and retain full control over your data.
[Star on Github](https://voideditor.com/<https:/github.com/voideditor/void>)[Get Access](https://voideditor.com/</email>)
Backed by![Y Combinator Logo](https://voideditor.com/yc.svg)
## The AI Features You Love.
## Tab
Press 'Tab' to apply autocomplete.
![Tab](https://voideditor.com/demos/autocomplete3.png)
## Ctrl + K
Edit your selection inline.
![Ctrl + K](https://voideditor.com/demos/inline4.png)
## Ctrl + L
Ask questions and include files. 
![Ctrl + L](https://voideditor.com/demos/sidebar4.png)
## 
Powered by VS Code.
Void is a fork of VS Code. We let you transfer over all your themes, keybinds, and settings in one click. 
![A slice of the void](https://voideditor.com/_next/image?url=%2Fvoid%2Flogo_cube_noshadow.png&w=256&q=75)
## Community Features.
Anyone can advance our Roadmap or build their own AI integration.
Index your Files.
![Index your Files.](https://voideditor.com/demos/filesystemunderstanding.png)
Intelligent Search With AI.
![Intelligent Search With AI.](https://voideditor.com/demos/textcolor.png)
Fine-Tuned Generation (e.g. Docstrings).
![Fine-Tuned Generation \(e.g. Docstrings\).](https://voideditor.com/demos/docstring.png)
View and Edit Underlying Prompts.
![View and Edit Underlying Prompts.](https://voideditor.com/demos/viewprompt.png)
## Experimental Features.
Fast Apply, even on 1000-line Files.
![Fast Apply, even on 1000-line Files.](https://voideditor.com/demos/instant.png)
Contextual Awareness.
![Contextual Awareness.](https://voideditor.com/demos/techstack.png)
Third Party Integrations.
We're building native support for codebase chat (Greptile), local hosting (Ollama), documentation search (DocSearch), and more.
![Greptile Logo](https://voideditor.com/greptile.png)![Ollama Logo](https://voideditor.com/ollama.png)![Docsearch Logo](https://voideditor.com/docsearch.svg)
And More...
If you're building in AI, get in touch to discuss integrating with Void.
## Any LLM, Anywhere.
Host your own models locally, or communicate directly with your favorites. 
Host Locally
![OpenAI Logo](https://voideditor.com/ollama.png)
![big picture](https://voideditor.com/meta.svg)
![big picture](https://voideditor.com/ms.png)
![big picture](https://voideditor.com/google.png)
![mistral](https://voideditor.com/mistral_small.png)
Never run out of API credits again. We offer tools like Ollama to host quality models locally.
Go Direct
![Claude Logo](https://voideditor.com/claude-icon.png)
![OpenAI Logo](https://voideditor.com/openai-logomark.png)
![Gemini Logo](https://voideditor.com/gemini.png)
Send direct to Claude, GPT, or Gemini. Unlike other editors, we don't act as a middleman to your LLM calls.
# Get Started with Void.
[Star on Github](https://voideditor.com/<https:/github.com/voideditor/void>)[Get Access](https://voideditor.com/</email>)
![A slice of the void](https://voideditor.com/_next/image?url=%2Fvoid%2Fslice_of_void.png&w=128&q=75)
© 2025 Glass Devtools, Inc. - All rights reserved.
[](https://voideditor.com/<https:/discord.gg/RSNjgaugJs>)[](https://voideditor.com/<https:/github.com/voideditor/void#readme>)hello@voideditor.com[Changelog](https://voideditor.com/</changelog>)[Beta](https://voideditor.com/</email>)

generated_description:
### Void: The Open Source Alternative to Cursor

**Overview**  
Void is an innovative open source code editor aiming to provide a robust alternative to tools like Cursor and GitHub Copilot. Founded in 2024 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S24, Void makes it easier for developers by allowing them to connect directly with open source large language models (LLMs) without compromising their privacy.

**Mission**  
The mission of Void is simple yet profound: it strives to empower developers with a powerful AI code editor while ensuring full control over their data. This focus on user autonomy and security sets them apart in a crowded marketplace.

**Team and Location**  
Based in San Francisco, Void is a small but focused team of two employees. They are mentored by Jared Friedman, a partner at Y Combinator, which adds a layer of credibility and insight to their operations.

**Key Features**  
- **User-Controlled AI Integration**: Unlike traditional editors, Void allows users to harness their own AI models, creating a more bespoke development environment without routing data through third-party systems.
- **VS Code Powered**: It's built as a fork of Visual Studio Code, enabling seamless importing of themes, keybindings, and settings with just a click.
- **Rich Community Infrastructure**: Void offers extensive community features to contribute to the roadmap or build AI integrations. Users can index files, utilize intelligent search powered by AI, and edit underlying prompts.
- **Experimental Features**: Think fast apply on large files, contextual awareness, and native support for third-party integrations (like Greptile and DocSearch).

**AI Capabilities**  
Void embraces the best AI tools, allowing features like autocomplete (just hit 'Tab'), inline editing ('Ctrl + K'), and asking contextual questions ('Ctrl + L'). The promise of using "Any LLM, Anywhere" speaks to the flexibility in both local and direct AI model communication.

**Community and Collaboration**  
The essence of Void's growth lies in its community involvement. Developers can suggest features and collaborate on improvements—truly fostering an environment where users can shape the future of the product.

### Getting Started  
To join the movement, interested developers can visit [Void's website](https://voideditor.com) for more information or to sign up for their waitlist and get involved.

---

Void is positioned at the intersection of open-source values and cutting-edge technology, making it a compelling option for developers looking for both privacy and power in their coding environments. As they continue to evolve, they could very well shape the future of coding tools as we know them.
